---
title: UsbmuxdNativeMethods.usbmuxd_set_tcp_endpoint method
---

Sets the TCP endpoint to which usbmuxd will connect if the socket type is set to SOCKET_TYPE_TCP

```csharp
public static int usbmuxd_set_tcp_endpoint(string host, ushort port)
```

| parameter | description |
| --- | --- |
| host | The hostname or IP address to which to connect |
| port | The port to which to connect. |

## Return Value

0 on success or negative on error
